description:
Don't let wet conditions keep you indoors. These lightweight merino blend socks have a waterproof-breathable membrane to keep your piggies warm and dry when the weather doesn't cooperate with your plans.

  • Outer sock is 95% nylon and 5% elastane. Liner sock is 45% merino wool, 45% polyester, 7.5% nylon and 2.5% elastane
  • HydroTech waterproof-breathable polyurethane laminate keeps water out in even the wettest conditions
  • Wicking polyester and merino lining manages moisture and insulates to keep your feet cozy
  • Elasticated arch support prevents bunching
  • Flat toe seam adds comfort
name: Bridgedale Storm Lightweight Boot Socks - Unisex
